alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 11:17PM MDT until July 04 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Harding County in northwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Perkins County in northwestern South Dakota... * Until 1215 AM MDT. * At 1117 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Ralph to 10 miles east of Buffalo to 7 miles north of Redig to 6 miles southeast of Gustave, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Reva, Ralph, Lodgepole, Sorum, White Butte, Prairie City, Hoover, Redig, Slim Buttes, Sheep Buttes, Haystack Buttes, Crow Buttes and East Short Pines. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
